body_html:
Unfortunately, I just ran into this same thing on my desktop.
ubuntu 14.04
bazel version 0.3.1
gtx1080, nvidia driver version 367
cuda8 + cudnn5
__git__version for tf: 'v0.10.0-1703-g0ed1dc2'

Then I set LD_LIBRARY_CONFIG

Then:
$ git clone ....tensorflow...
$ bazel build tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package -c opt --config=cuda
$ mkdir pip_package
$ bazel-bin/build tensorflow/tools/pip_package pwd/pip_package
$ cd pip_package

when I pip install, run python and then import tensorflow, I get the same error above.
If I create a virtualenv and pip install it, import tensorflow, I see that cuda loads successfully.

Should I create a new issue, or should I reopen this one?
